title: Lunar Telepath

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose a player to link with, sharing minds.
- Deal a basic attack to your partner.
- If your partner has died the previous night, target a player with a powerful rampage attack.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At night, linked players cannot talk in their own personal channel, but can talk in and control the other's channel. You will have a chat channel during the night with them.
- If one of you wins, the other one will also win.
- If your partner dies, you must wait a night before linking with a new player. You cannot link with anyone whilst your partner is still alive.
- You have a layer of basic defence that blocks one attack.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose you (or current linked player's)
